content.webTitle: Photographer charged after actor's Disney party

fields.headline: Photographer charged after actor's Disney party
fields.bodyText: A photographer has been charged with child endangerment and battery after allegedly pushing one child and striking another with his camera while trying to photograph the actor Reese Witherspoon. Todd Wallace faces six charges for allegedly disrupting a birthday celebration involving the actor, her six-year-old daughter and friends at a Disney theme park in Anaheim, near Los Angeles, California, last month. When members of the group refused to have their photograph taken, Wallace, 44, allegedly became physically and verbally abusive.
